mapper.sql: id, tranName, version, merCode, orderNo, orderTime, payType, amount, currency, productName, orderDesc, returnURL, notifyURL, reservedField1, reservedField2, sign, menberid, `status`, `source`, createtime
mapper.select:
select count(x.id)
from payment_request_jetpay x LEFT join payment_result_jetpay y on x.orderNo=y.orderNo LEFT join app_member z on x.menberid=z.id where 1=1
and z.account like '%${params.account}%'
and x.payType = '${params.payType}'
and x.orderNo = '${params.orderNo}'
and x.merCode = '${params.dsf}'
and x.createtime < '${params.endTime}'
and x.createtime >= '${params.startTime}'
and x.status = '${params.status}'
and w.op_id=${params.opid}

select sum(x.amount) AS sumall, SUM( CASE WHEN x.`status` = 1 THEN x.amount ELSE 0 END ) AS fall1, SUM( CASE WHEN x.`status` = 2 THEN x.amount ELSE 0 END ) AS fall2, SUM( CASE WHEN x.`status` = 3 THEN x.amount ELSE 0 END ) AS fall3, SUM( CASE WHEN x.`status` = 4 THEN x.amount ELSE 0 END ) AS fall4
from payment_request_jetpay x LEFT join payment_result_jetpay y on x.orderNo=y.orderNo LEFT join app_member z on x.menberid=z.id where 1=1
and z.account like '%${params.account}%'
and x.payType = '${params.payType}'
and x.orderNo = '${params.orderNo}'
and x.merCode = '${params.dsf}'
and x.createtime < '${params.endTime}'
and x.createtime >= '${params.startTime}'
and x.status = '${params.status}'
and w.op_id=${params.opid}

SELECT x.id, z.account, x.payType, x.merCode, x.source, x.orderNo, x.amount, y.ordAmt, x.`status`, y.paymentState, x.createtime, x.menberid FROM payment_request_jetpay x LEFT JOIN payment_result_jetpay y ON x.orderNo = y.orderNo LEFT JOIN app_member z ON x.menberid = z.id where 1=1
and z.account like '%${params.account}%'
and x.payType = '${params.payType}'
and x.orderNo = '${params.orderNo}'
and x.merCode = '${params.dsf}'
and x.createtime < '${params.endTime}'
and x.createtime >= '${params.startTime}'
and x.status = '${params.status}'
and w.op_id=${params.opid}
order by ${params.orderBy} desc
limit #{params.offset} , #{params.limit}

SELECT count(x.id) as binum, count(DISTINCT z.account) as yhnum,
SUM(x.amount/100) as qiannum , SUM(y.ordAmt/100) as zqiannum, MAX(x.merCode) as merCode, (SELECT count(x.id)
FROM payment_request_jetpay x LEFT JOIN payment_result_jetpay y ON x.orderNo = y.orderNo LEFT JOIN app_member z ON x.menberid = z.id where y.paymentState='${state}' and x.createtime < '${endTime}'
and x.createtime >= '${startTime}' ) as zbinum, (SELECT count(DISTINCT z.account)
FROM payment_request_jetpay x LEFT JOIN payment_result_jetpay y ON x.orderNo = y.orderNo LEFT JOIN app_member z ON x.menberid = z.id where y.paymentState='${state}' and x.createtime < '${endTime}'
and x.createtime >= '${startTime}' ) as zyhnum, (SELECT sum(y.ordAmt/100) FROM payment_request_jetpay x LEFT JOIN payment_result_jetpay y ON x.orderNo = y.orderNo LEFT JOIN app_member z ON x.menberid = z.id where y.paymentState='${state}' and x.createtime < '${endTime}'
and x.createtime >= '${startTime}' ) as zjenum
FROM payment_request_jetpay x LEFT JOIN payment_result_jetpay y ON x.orderNo = y.orderNo LEFT JOIN app_member z ON x.menberid = z.id where y.paymentState='${state}'
and x.createtime < '${endTime}'
and x.createtime >= '${startTime}'
GROUP BY x.merCode;

SELECT
count(DISTINCT x.merCode)
FROM payment_request_jetpay x LEFT JOIN payment_result_jetpay y ON x.orderNo = y.orderNo LEFT JOIN app_member z ON x.menberid = z.id where y.paymentState='${state}'
and x.createtime < '${endTime}'
and x.createtime >= '${startTime}'
